group_1.textRight: Mel...
That's good, keep up that sitting posture.
Don't go pampering her, Mifuyu.
This is the one time when@I really can't go easy on her.
Mel... You understand what your@fortune-telling really is, don't you?

group_1.textLeft: Could there be a chance that your readings@aren't actually accurate?

group_1.textRight: [chara:303701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!
Don't tell me you don't believe in my@predictions either, Yachiyo-senpai?!

group_1.textLeft: Maybe your fortune-telling power isn't@actually reading the future...
But the power to shape it to whatever@fortune you read?
Basically...your fortune readings MAKE@the future you read come to pass.

group_1.textRight: So, why'd you do the reading?

group_1.textLeft: You see, she was really begging me, so, I just...
Look, uh, Yachiyo-senpai,@I know that what I did was wrong.
But still, aren't you scolding me@a lot harder than usual...?

group_1.textRight: I don't get angry for no reason.
You'd understand if you'd ever been in love...@Does that make sense?
Yeah, that sort of thing.

group_1.textLeft: I don't really know then...@I haven't had my first love yet...

group_1.textRight: Oh my, so that's how it is.

group_1.textLeft: What does it feel like to be in love?@Why is it so important?

group_1.textRight: Eh...

group_1.textLeft: Please tell me, I want to know!
If I could just understand Yachiyo-senpai's anger!

group_1.textRight: Mifuyu...!
Uh...
You see...
Right...it's very important...
Um...
Love is, you know...
When you think about the other person,@it makes your heart race...
You want to be with them...
The point is...how do I say this?@It's like...
Right.
Thinking that it would be nice to spend@some time alone with your partner...
A feeling like that...?
...Mifuyu, pass.
Sorry, but I'm going to let you reap it...
Eeh...?
Alright...I understand...
Well, it's like...your heart races...

group_1.textLeft: So, the same thing that Yachiyo-senpai said.

group_1.textRight: Um......[chara:100602:lipSynch_0][wait:2.0][chara:100602:cheek_1][chara:100602:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:100602:lipSynch_1]b-but!
Maybe that abstract feeling is all there is to it...!
In time becoming lovers...@And then getting married together...
And in the end, saying farewell and passing on...
In other words, the truth of this feeling,@the meaning of love, it's...!
The sensation of being drawn toward your destined@partner, someone you can be wedded to for life!

group_1.textLeft: I think I sort of get how important it is now...

group_1.textRight: And whether or not it works out all depends@on how that first confession goes...
It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity@that you'll never be able to redo.
So that's why, Mel.
Your reading can't tell if that love will come true.
If your reading comes up poorly, then@everything they worked for will be for naught.

group_1.textLeft: My fortune would decide the fate of that@once-in-a-lifetime chance...

group_1.textRight: That's why I got so mad at you.

group_1.textLeft: But that should be fine, then,@since I read a good fortune.

group_1.textRight: Well...that's good, then.
If your reading shows happiness,@then that girl should be happy.
But don't ever predict the outcome@of someone's confession again.
